sub_title: Law & International Relations Expert | Professional Interpreter & Translator
summary: Throughout my career, I've seamlessly blended teaching, research, and hands-on fieldwork across academia, global organizations, and diverse industries. As an assistant professor, I've crafted engaging learning environments and pushed the frontiers of scholarship.  My expertise lies in navigating intricate legal terrain, fostering cross-cultural communication, and offering innovative solutions to complex challenges. I'm dedicated to making a lasting imprint, leveraging my global perspective and bilingual fluency for impactful contributions. Let's connect and explore new possibilities together.

projects.title: UN-RELATED EXPEREINCES
projects.description:
UNITED NATIONS Projects and Events 
-Member of Organizing Committee of the Fifth Executive Board Meeting of Asian Mayors Forum & Cultural Committee of UCLG-MEWA, Tehran and Qazvin, 29 Aug-01 Sep 2015.    
-Member of Organizing Committee of Expert Group Statement on Draft of City Prosperity Index, UN HABITAT The World Secretariat of City Prospect Index (CPI), Tehran Milad Tower and Islamic Azad  
University, Takestan Branch, 14 May 2013.
-Member of Organizing Committee of First World Assembly of Islamic Cities, Conference and Exhibition, Qazvin, Old Capital of Iran, 31 Aug-01 Sep 2013.   
-Interpreter for the former UN SECRETARY GENERAL, Mr. BAN KI MOON and member of the Protocol and Organizing Committee of the 16th Summit of the Non-Aligned Movement held in Tehran, Iran. I  
received an Appreciation letter from His Excellency, MR. BAN KI MOON. Also, I received one appreciation letter from UN Resident Coordinator in Tehran, Ms. Consuelo Vidal. The summit was attended by leaders of 120 countries, including 24 presidents, 3 kings, 8 prime ministers and 50 foreign ministers and it was truly the most important event in the history of Iran in the last 50 years or so, 26 Aug-31 Aug 2012.
-Interpreter (Persian to English and English to Persian) to Islam, Cedaw and Women's Rights, UN Sponsored Conference Reservations to the Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of Discrimination Against Women (CEDAW), Tunis, Tunisia, 4 Aug-6 Aug 2008. 
-Published a Book: A Translation of UNESCO’s Information and Communication Technology in Education from English to Persian. Peyvand-e-Mehr Publication, Tehran, Iran, 2007.
-Coordinator to the International Congress "World Awaits Peace and Solidarity” hosted by Mehr White Home Human Rights Organization, Tehran& Qazvin, Iran, 23 Sep-10 Oct 2003.

company.name: Qazvin Chamber of Commerce, Industries, Mines and Agriculture (QCCIMA)

profile_positions.description:
- Providing consulting services to merchants and business owners both inside and outside the country.   - Establishing joint councils and chambers of commerce with other countries.
- Dispatching commercial and marketing delegations to target countries.
- Receiving trade and marketing delegations from other countries.
- Issuing letters of introduction to facilitate obtaining visas for those members traveling to other 
  countries.
- Introducing the country's export capabilities and commercial and industrial advantages.
- Holding and participating in business seminars and meetings of specialized organizations.
- Circulating all notifications of tenders, auctions, business and investment opportunities, and other 
  important business and/or trade news in a timely manner.
- Preparing country business and detailed explanatory reports.
- Preparing, regulating, and signing memorandums, agreements, and commercial protocols with 
  chambers of commerce of other countries.
- Interacting with the business representatives of Iran in other countries as well as foreign embassies in 
  order to expand and develop business relations.
- Interacting with national and transnational institutions active in the field of business development 
  support, such as the Asian Productivity Organization, the Colombo Plan, the Japan Cooperation Center 
  in the Middle East, UNCTAD, etc.
- Examining and scrutinizing obstacles and problems in developing business relationships with other 
  countries and providing appropriate solutions.
- Actively Participating in the meetings of the joint commission with other countries.

profile_positions.title: International Relations Manager and Secretary of Technical Commissions

profile_positions.description:
Freelance Correspondent & News Anchor
●  Producing more than 40 Reports on Tourism and Cultural Sites
Some of my translation experience in producing movie subtitles from/into Persian and English included but not limited to the following works: 
●  Directing and translating the first promotional movie on “Qazvin Province's Potentialities and Capabilities into English” with the collaboration of Qazvin Cultural Heritage, Handicrafts, and Tourism Organization.
●  Translating a movie into English entitled "Love, Fire and Copper", A documentary on Master Ghaneh's works, the coppersmith and sculpturist with collaboration of Qazvin Broadcasting Organization (IRIB)
●  Translating a movie into English entitled" Story of a municipality", A documentary on the history and formation of Qazvin's municipality with more than one century record of ups and downs and different activities.
Tourism Experience, as an International Outbound Tour Guide  
●  With travel experience to more than 70 countries on five continents
●  Providing various touristic services such as Outbound English Tour Guide, Providing content for Magazines and Websites, etc for events such as Sports, Trade Exhibitions and Educational gatherings. These professional services included but not limited to the following top travel agencies:
2014-2021	  ●  Working with Safa Seir Toos Travel Agency executing many outgoing tours to Australia, Brazil, Asian and European Countries, etc., FIFA WORLD CUP VIP Tour 2018, and International Professional Motorcyclists Incoming tour (From  Paris to Isfahan Project, Raid Orion Revival- 7000 km across Europe-Asia countries 2018), Mashhad & Tehran, Iran. 
2003-2021	  ●  Managing and guiding Outgoing International Fairs, providing the website contents, translation services, and cooperation with Pishvaz Asia Tour and Travel Agency, Tehran, Iran.
20 March 2000-21 July 2001	  ●  Working as a part-time Manager of Commerce and Internet Affairs of Shokoofeh Travel and Tour Agency, Tehran, Iran.
